name: Lost Souls (itch) (heckadactyl)
description:
Made in 1 day as part of Mini Jam 114.

Code &Music by heckadactyl. 

 Controls:  Space bar to separate from body, to switch to other body (to control separately) OR join with body (when standing next to each other). R to restart map at any time.

There are a few bugs where collisions won't register as they should, if that happens, just step away a few tiles, and try again.
